pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot with no camera movement. The video presents a wide, elevated view of a major city skyline set against a backdrop of a large mountain range. In the foreground, there are lower-rise residential buildings and abundant green trees, which give way to the dense cluster of skyscrapers that make up the downtown core in the midground and background.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
